name.bg: Разширение за Абонамент за RSS (от Google)
name.ca: Extensió de subscripció a RSS (de Google)
name.es_419: Extensión de la suscripción RSS (de Google)
name.vi: Tiện ích mở rộng Đăng ký RSS (của Google)
name.zh_CN: RSS Subscription Extension（由 Google 提供）
name.zh_TW: RSS 訂閱擴充功能 (由 Google 提供)

short.ar: لإضافة خاصية الاشتراك بنقرة واحدة إلى شريط الأدوات.
short.am,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,fa,fil,gu,kn,: Adds one-click subscription to your toolbar.
short.bg: Добавя абонамент с едно кликване към лентата ви с инструменти.
short.ca: Afegeix la subscripció d'un sol clic a la barra d'eines.
short.cs: Přidá na lištu možnost přihlášení k odběru jedním kliknutím.
short.da: Føjer tilmelding i ét klik til din værktøjslinje.
short.de: Abonnieren Sie Feeds mit einem Klick auf Ihre Toolbar.
short.el: Προσθέτει στη γραμμή εργαλείων σας τη δυνατότητα εγγραφής με ένα κλικ.
short.es: Permite añadir una suscripción a la barra de herramientas con un solo clic.
short.es_419: Agrega la suscripción mediante un clic a tu barra de herramientas.
short.fr: Ajoute un bouton à votre barre d'outils qui vous permet de vous abonner en un seul clic.
short.he: מוסיף לסרגל הכלים שלך אפשרות להצטרף כמנוי בלחיצה אחת.
short.hi: आपके टूलबार में एकल-क्लिक वाली सदस्यता जोड़ता है.
short.hr: Na alatnu traku dodaje pretplatu jednim klikom.
short.hu: Egykattintásos feliratkozási lehetőséget add hozzá az eszköztárhoz.
short.id: Menambah langganan sekali-klik ke bilah alat Anda.
short.it: Aggiunge l'iscrizione con un clic alla barra degli strumenti.
short.ja: ワンクリックで登録できるボタンをツールバーに追加します。
short.lt: Prie įrankių juostos pridedama prenumerata vienu paspaudimu.
short.nl: Functie voor abonneren met één klik toevoegen aan uw werkbalk.
short.pl: Dodaje do paska narzędzi możliwość subskrybowania jednym kliknięciem.
short.pt_BR: Adiciona a possibilidade de se inscrever com apenas um clique à sua barra de ferramentas.
short.pt_PT: Adiciona a subscrição com um só clique à barra de ferramentas.
short.ro: Adaugă în bara de instrumente un buton pentru abonarea cu un singur clic.
short.ru: Добавление кнопки быстрой подписки на панель инструментов.
short.sk: Do panela s nástrojmi pridá možnosť prihlásenia sa na odber jedným kliknutím.
short.sl: V orodno vrstico doda možnost naročanja z enim klikom.
short.sr: Додаје дугме за пријаву једним кликом на траку с алаткама.
short.sv: Lägger till prenumeration med ett klick på verktygsfältet.
short.th: เพิ่มการสมัครสมาชิกด้วยคลิกเดียวในแถบเครื่องมือของคุณ
short.tr: Araç çubuğunuza, tek tıkla abonelik özelliği ekler.
short.uk: Додає на панель інструментів значок для підписки одним кліком.
short.vi: Thêm đăng ký bằng một cú nhấp chuột vào thanh công cụ của bạn.
short.zh_CN: 在您的工具栏上添加一键订阅。
short.zh_TW: 在工具列中加入點擊訂閱。

long.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,es,es_419,et,:
This extension auto-detects RSS feeds on the page you are reading and upon finding one will display an RSS icon in the Omnibox, allowing you to click on it to preview the feed content and subscribe.

The extension comes with 2 feed readers predefined (Bloglines and My Yahoo) but also allows you to add any web-based feed reader of your choice to the list.

What's new in version 2.2.2?
  + Doesn't run in the background all the time, only when in use.
  + Updated to not use a soon-to-be-deprecated API.

What's new in version 2.2.1?
  + Removed Google Reader and iGoogle from the list of default feed readers.

What's new in version 2.1?
  + This extension is now available in over 40 languages.
  + If you see localization problems, let us know: http://crbug.com/37233 

Changelist:
  + Navigating to feed pages directly now takes you to the subscription page (instead of showing XML).
  + Found a feed where this doesn't happen? Let us know: http://crbug.com/32967
  + Added an Options page for configuring feed readers.
  + Added an option to skip the feed preview page when subscribing.
  + Added a link to the preview page for those wanting to copy the direct feed link (look for the [ Feed ] link in the blue bar).
  + Added support for multiple feeds per page.
  + When will this be added to Chrome? Star this bug: http://crbug.com/33181 to keep track.
long.am,bn,en,en_AU,en_US,fa,fil,gu,kn,ml,mr,:
This extension auto-detects RSS feeds on the page you are reading and upon finding one will display an RSS icon in the Omnibox, allowing you to click on it to preview the feed content and subscribe using your favorite feed reader.

The extension comes with a few feed readers predefined (Newsblur, My Yahoo, Feedly, Inoreader, The Old Reader) but also allows you to add any web-based feed reader of your choice to the list.

What's new in version 2.2.8?
  + Minor bugfix.

What's new in version 2.2.8?
  + Updated to extension manifest version 3.
  + Changed the Feed link in Preview page to Copy feed url to clipboard.

What's new in version 2.2.7?
  + Fixed truncation in feed preview.

What's new in version 2.2.6?
  + Added a couple of more Feed reader services.

What's new in version 2.2.5?
  + This version contains security fixes.
  + Replaced deprecated Bloglines RSS service with Newsblur.

What's new in version 2.2.2?
  + Doesn't run in the background all the time, only when in use.
  + Updated to not use a soon-to-be-deprecated API.

What's new in version 2.2.1?
  + Removed Google Reader and iGoogle from the list of default feed readers.

What's new in version 2.1?
  + This extension is now available in over 40 languages.
  + If you see localization problems, let us know: http://crbug.com/37233 

Changelist:
  + Navigating to feed pages directly now takes you to the subscription page (instead of showing XML).
  + Found a feed where this doesn't happen? Let us know: http://crbug.com/32967
  + Added an Options page for configuring feed readers.
  + Added an option to skip the feed preview page when subscribing.
  + Added a link to the preview page for those wanting to copy the direct feed link (look for the [ Feed ] link in the blue bar).
  + Added support for multiple feeds per page.
